files.patch:
@@ -77,12 +77,8 @@ jobs:
     strategy:
       fail-fast: false
       matrix:
-        browsers: [chrome, firefox, electron]
+        browsers: [chrome, firefox]
         node-version: [20.x]
-        include:
-          - browsers: electron
-            spec: cypress/e2e/default/learn/challenges/projects.ts
-
     services:
       mongodb:
         image: mongo:4.4
